hero.title: MindVaultIP White Paper
hero.subtitle: A Decentralized Framework for Global Innovation and Intellectual Property

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.content1: MindVaultIP is a decentralized platform that transforms human creativity into a borderless, verifiable, and tradable asset. Built on the Base Network and powered by Artificial Intelligence, it allows anyone, anywhere, to register, validate, and monetize their inventions, ideas, and discoveries on the blockchain.
abstract.content2: Through its native token ‚Äî Ideon Cerebrum (IDN) ‚Äî the platform creates an inclusive economy where innovation is rewarded and intellectual ownership becomes eternal.

innovationInequality.title: The Innovation Inequality Problem
innovationInequality.content1: The global intellectual property (IP) system is outdated. It rewards only those who can afford legal processes, international filings, and expensive lawyers ‚Äî leaving billions of creative minds without a voice.
innovationInequality.content2: MindVaultIP changes that. By using blockchain and AI, every human ‚Äî regardless of wealth, location, or education ‚Äî can protect, validate, and trade their ideas instantly and transparently.
innovationInequality.highlight: Innovation becomes a right, not a privilege.

rigidCrypto.title: The Rigid Crypto Economy Problem
rigidCrypto.content1: While cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin revolutionized finance, they remain technically rigid and socially limited. Only those with computing power and technical knowledge can participate in mining, and the supply cap of 21 million coins leaves no flexibility for future global growth.
rigidCrypto.content2: There is also no direct link between real human value (creativity, ideas, or innovation) and token value.
rigidCrypto.highlight: Ideon Cerebrum (IDN) is designed to fix this. It's not mined by machines, but earned by creativity.

solution.title: The MindVaultIP Solution
solution.intro: MindVaultIP eliminates the traditional barriers of intellectual property through three technological pillars:

blockchain.title: Blockchain Proof
blockchain.description: Every uploaded file is hashed and registered on-chain via the Base Network, creating a permanent, immutable proof of ownership.

ai.title: AI-Powered Validation
ai.description: The AI Council evaluates each proof for novelty, originality, and commercial potential, producing unbiased, transparent results.

marketplace.title: Decentralized Marketplace
marketplace.description: Approved proofs can be listed and traded directly between creators and investors using IDN tokens, forming a self-sustaining innovation economy.

token.title: The Ideon Cerebrum (IDN) Token
token.intro: Ideon Cerebrum (IDN) is the native utility and governance token powering the MindVaultIP ecosystem. It represents the measurable value of human imagination and creativity.

transaction.title: Transaction Medium
transaction.description: Exclusive currency for marketplace transactions and proof registrations

rewards.title: Innovation Rewards
rewards.description: IDN rewards are issued for validated proofs

governance.title: Governance Power
governance.description: Token holders will vote on major proposals and protocol upgrades

premium.title: Premium Access
premium.description: Used for expert reviews, AI analysis, and Talent Embassy benefits

descriptions.support: Grants for humanitarian partners and NGOs
descriptions.investors: Funding innovation hubs and physical talent centers

futureIssuance.title: Future Issuance
futureIssuance.intro: Every 20 years, up to 10,000,000 new IDN tokens may be issued:
futureIssuance.conclusion: This ensures long-term flexibility while maintaining economic balance.

governance.title: Governance Model (DAO)
governance.intro: Beginning in 2027, MindVaultIP will transition to a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO). Holders of IDN will govern decisions regarding:

items.privacy: Only cryptographic hashes are stored on-chain for user privacy.
items.verifiable: Every transaction is verifiable and traceable.
items.opensource: Smart contracts are open-source and auditable on Base Network.
items.accountability: All AI validation logs are timestamped for accountability.

phase1.title: Phase 1 'Digital'
phase1.description: Platform Launch & Marketplace Launch (proof, sell & buy)

phase2.title: Phase 2 'Digital'
phase2.description: First Airdrop & IDN Token Generation Event (TGE)

purposes.registration: Pay IDN to register/timestamp IP on-chain.
purposes.governance: Vote on DAO proposals and grants (from 2027).
purposes.rewards: Earn IDN for validated innovations & contributions.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.content: IDN is not just a token ‚Äî it's the economic layer for human innovation, connecting creators, investors, and institutions in a borderless market where talent becomes a universally tradable asset.
conclusion.mission: Mission: To make innovation a global right, not a privilege.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content1: The Multimind Awards represent the highest honor within the MindVaultIP ecosystem ‚Äî a decentralized recognition of human creativity, impact, and perseverance.
overview.content2: Unlike traditional awards confined to single disciplines or chosen by institutions, the Multimind Awards span all domains of excellence ‚Äî from science, technology, and art to music, sports, literature, social innovation, and human resilience.

philosophy.title: Philosophy and Vision
philosophy.quote: Every mind that creates, endures, or inspires ‚Äî deserves to be seen.
philosophy.content: The Multimind Awards redefine how the world measures achievement. In this system, there is no single standard of greatness. Every act of creativity, discovery, artistry, or courage can hold equal value ‚Äî whether it comes from a physicist, a poet, a musician, or an athlete.

award.title: ü•á Multimind Award (CA-GOLD)
award.description: Granted to individuals whose creations or actions generate measurable human impact ‚Äî in any field, chosen by global community vote.

allocation.title: Annual Allocation
allocation.content: 10% of the annual Talent Reward Pool is reserved for Multimind Awards. This ensures rarity, integrity, and symbolic prestige.

stage1.title: Stage 1 ‚Äî AI Origin Check
stage1.content: The AI engine performs global cross-referencing to ensure the submission has not been previously registered on any blockchain or international IP system.

stage2.title: Stage 2 ‚Äî AI Council Assessment
stage2.intro: The submission is evaluated by an AI Council composed of four distinct intelligence modules:

modules.skeptic: üß† The Skeptic ‚Äî questions novelty and practical proof
modules.realist: ‚öñÔ∏è The Realist ‚Äî evaluates feasibility and logic

stage3.title: Stage 3 ‚Äî Human Expert Review
stage3.content: Approved entries are reviewed by verified specialists in their respective domains. Each expert panel validates or rejects based on originality, potential, and authenticity.

talentEmbassy.title: Phase 3 (2030‚Äì2035) ‚Äî The Talent Embassy City

overview.title: A Living City for the Minds of the World
overview.content1: The Talent Embassy City is the physical extension of MindVaultIP ‚Äî a real-world ecosystem built entirely for human creativity, innovation, and talent.
overview.content2: Unlike traditional talent shows or innovation programs limited to stages or studios, the Talent Embassy is a living city ‚Äî a purpose-built environment with no permanent residents, only creators, thinkers, and innovators from every corner of the world.

concept.title: Core Concept
concept.quote: A city with no citizens ‚Äî only creators.
concept.content: The Talent Embassy City is where the digital proof of innovation meets physical creation. It operates on the same principles as MindVaultIP: transparency, equality, and community-driven validation.

items.hub: A global hub of arts, science, sports, technology, and humanitarian innovation
items.districts: Divided into districts ‚Äî Innovation Zone, Art Quarter, Science Hub, Performance Arena, and AI Research Dome
items.economy: Every structure, performance, and creation in the city is part of a living proof economy
items.transparency: All transactions, recognitions, and votes are recorded transparently on-chain via IDN

vision.title: Long-Term Vision
vision.content1: The Talent Embassy City will act as a model city for future generations ‚Äî a prototype of how nations could evolve toward creativity-based economies.
vision.content2: It will become a permanent international destination for discovery, learning, and collaboration ‚Äî a place where humanity can see its own potential alive and thriving.

talentEmbassy.finalQuote: Wherever you're from, whatever you create ‚Äî the world will see you.
